title: 171-G
statement: G. Mysterious numbers - 2time limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutInputThe only line of input contains three integersa1,a2,a3(1 ≤a1,a2,a3≤ 20), separated by spaces.OutputOutput a single integer.ExamplesInput2 3 2Output5Input13 14 1Output14Input14 5 9Output464Input17 18 3Output53

processed.result: You are given three integers $a_1$, $a_2$, and $a_3$.  Calculate and output the sum of these three integers.
You are given three numbers. Find the sum of these three numbers.
